Name: Atilio's Group
description:
Atilio's Group is formed by 10 farmers in Kilolo North District and is being represented by Atilio, who is the group leader pictured above. He is 47 years old and has six children. Atilio has been a farmer for more than 20 years and is often referred to as a very hardworking individual.

Atilio isnâ€™t new to One Acre Fund, he actually joined the program in 2015 and has since noticed his life has changed; especially in the sense that he has been able to consistently feed his family ever since. This year, Atilio will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of his loan, but will also purchase a solar light. He is very excited about this addition since now he will be able to have light during dark hours for his children to be able to study.

Using this loan, Atilio's Group will purchase a total of five solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 11.5 acres.
